EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining Pivotal at Mendix World
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining Pivotal at Mendix World 2016. We hope you enjoyed hearing how Pivotal is helping nearly a third of Fortune 100 companies to deliver transformational digital experiences and continuous innovation.
Learn how customers <[[http://pivotal.io/customers]]> like General Electric (GE), Ford, Daimler, Volkswagen, HSBC, Santander, Morgan Stanley, Orange, Verizon, Home Depot, Comcast, Humana, Lockheed Martin, and Allstate all use Pivotal’s products and services to digitally transform their businesses and disrupt established markets.
Start your Cloud Native journey <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> on the Cloud Native microsite to learn why it matters, what it looks like, and how to become Cloud Native. And remember to pick up your free copy of the O’Reilly eBook Cloud Foundry: The Cloud Native Platform <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform]]> on the Pivotal site.
Are you interested in an on-site Cloud Native workshop or a complimentary evaluation from our experts? Please send your request to ischuller@pivotal.io <[[emailto:ischuller@pivotal.io]]>.
Stay in touch with Pivotal and join the conversation on our blogs <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/]]>, podcasts <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and on Twitter <[[http://www.twitter.com/Pivotal]]>.
Kind regards,
Ines Schuller | Account Executive EMEA ischuller@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ischuller@pivotal.io]]> | +44 7769 324 503 Follow Us: Twitter <[[http://www.twitter.com/Pivotal]]> | LinkedIn <[[http://www.linkedin.com/company/pivotalsoftware]]> | Facebook <[[http://www.facebook.com/pivotalsoftware]]> | YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/goPivotal]]>
